places_with_reviews.name: The Fern Royal Farm Resort, Anjar, Kutch
address: The Fern Royal Farm Resort, Plot No. 66, Survey No. 258, Royal Riviera Farm, Bhuj - Anjar Hwy, opp. Shriji Petrol Pump, Anjar, Ratatalav, Gujarat 370110, India

reviews.text:
The property is great and has good amenities! The staff however, seems new and still under training, but still helpful!  The Manager was very cooperative and resolved our issues quickly! The rooms are spacious and good. They also have Private Villas with pools on the property if you wanna opt for those.

It's 15-20 mins away from the main market, but really worth the distance. You can easily book a cab in advance to take you back and forth! My overall experience at The Fern Anjar was great!

Pro-Tip: The Gym, Pool and Restaurant are great, but avoid the Spa! I had a very weird experience at the entrance desk itself, the receptionist at the Spa gave me some ridiculous explanation when I asked if they had just foot massage therapy available, which made me question the entire service.

We had a blast at The Fern Royal Farm Resort, Anjar, thanks to Ritik and Rohit! They were phenomenal in guiding us through various in-house activities like table tennis, 8-ball pool, and archery. Their friendliness and expertise made every game enjoyable. Highly recommend joining them for any activity!

We had a superb stay. The climate was also very pleasant. Rooms are very good, neat and clean. Food is Amazing. Clean and neat swimming pool. Very good place for photo shoots. The property also has a garden with kids playing area. Also there is a game zone for kids and club house for every one. The property also has a gym, spa, mini theater,  in-house clubbing. Only thing they missed with is to offer clubbing and mini theater as a complimentary to the guest who stay there with some specific timings everyday. As many 5 star offer this kind of service to the guest who stay in property as a complimentary. So if this can be done than I am sure that everybody will have a memorable stay at The Fern Royal Anjar. Last and not the least, they have given us a complimentary photo frame which can be kept at home anywhere. This photo frame will make us always remember about The Fern Royal Anjar

When I have arrived at the reception desk I was astonished by the view of the surroundings and hall area that hardly is seen in 5 star hotels or resorts.
The new year celebration was an tremendous experience worthy of your time.
The staff was joyful, jolly and helpful in dealing with the guests.
I would like to mention and thank the staff members like Rani  and Vicky  &all team their cooperation with the guests.
HAPPY NEW YEAR

We had booked two rooms for two nights each and had a pleasant experience with the Fern Royal Farm Resort during our stay around the republic day weekend last week. Rooms were spacious and clean. The only issue we had was the location as we had planned to visit a lot of places in Kutch which were a bit far away from the hotel’s location. Otherwise, I’d like to visit this one again in future and would recommend it to everyone.

places_with_reviews.name: Manav Residency
address: Madhavbag Opp Varsamadi Naka Near Jain Dada Vadi, Kushal Nagar, Anjar, Kutch,, Anjar, Gujarat 370110, India

reviews.text: Good place to stay and service is also very quick. Sweet staff.

We have been eating at Manav restaurant for years but there was no problem in food or service, but since the new Manav Square has opened for some time, we are facing one problem and that is very poor service. When it was found out that the reason for this was that some or the other events happen regularly in both the hotels due to which the cooking and service staff gets reduced.

Today when I went to eat food at old Manav, they were not even giving the menu and after a long time when the food arrived, there were no plates, spoons or even water glasses. I have never seen such poor service and that too in a MANAV restaurant. I want to tell you that you should increase your staff or work only on events.

Excellent place, food and best for photoshoot.
Rooms were neat and clean
Good place. Good food. As a  person from other state, i feel that they want us to have food there and not outside. They didnt restrict us. But still felt the same.

I would recommend everyone to spend more and stay in decent hotels like Radisson or Fern. This is an OK type Hotel. Food is still good. If are not at all fussy about bed, washroom, staff behaviour then you may be able to put up with the standard of this hotel. For me this will be my first and last stay at Shree Manav Anjar.

places_with_reviews.name: Shree Ramkrupa Party Plot & Resort
address: Mitha Pasvariya, G.IDC, Road, Anjar, Gujarat 370110, India

reviews.text: Our resort stay was absolute paradise! The breathtaking views, luxurious accommodations, and outstanding service made it a dream vacation. The amenities were fantastic, and we can't wait to return! Highly recommended.

Water in the swimming pool is not clean and is very small.
Resort claims that 50 people can be accommodated in the swimming pool, but not possible.
Third class washrooms and no changing rooms available.
Uniform atmosphere with complete secure morning
A good private space. Pool is clean and the games area is an added bonus too. Rooms are decent.

This is amaging trip to this place . This place have best natural view ever & this kind of hotels are perfect for valuable customers .The services are very good & hotels are kind facility in a room as feeling as royality.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Toral Residency
address: vaishali cinema, Shiv Shakti Society, Vir Bhaghat Singh Nagar, Anjar, Gujarat 370110, India

reviews.text: It was a pleasant experience staying in Hotel Toral Residency. Staff was too polite and helpful. Most important thing is you will get warm water 24 hours. Transport connectivity is too easy.

Amazing atmosphere. Nice location. Sufficient parking space. Neat and clean room, bathroom also. Hot n cold water available. Supportive staffing. Very chief and economy food breakfast available. Thanks 👍 Hotel Toral Residency

I stayed for total of 3 days. Decent rooms . All basic facilities available. Service is also good. I had raised few problems after the room was allotted. The hotel management quickly addressed my concern and changed the room as it was available . Would recommend.

Hotel Toral Residency, it has a planned and expected guests and that is the reason they have  everything just like that, like there is no such room.service nor the well maintained rooms. The entrance itself is worst. The ambience is worst. It is situated in some closed mall.or shopping center, which might be having a cinema screen in itself. But the mall is closed and have missused in by people in the night. So the safety it self is an issue. Overall i don't recommend it for family stay.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Payal
address: 428J+9PX, NH41, Ajepar Nagar, Anjar, Gujarat 370110, India

reviews.text:
The hotel was pretty decent situated In a very less traffic area. Got a room for Rs 400. Manager was polite and helpful. Had a good night stay over here. Recommended.

Further details can be found as below.

- Walk-in booking
- Single person
- Date: 10 Dec 2023
- Parking - No (Street parking opposite the hotel)
Staff/Owner behaviour is so rude dont stay here guys .. there are many hotels nearby in this price range with so much luxury wanna rate it ZERO but there are no options available 😿
Pathetic rooms and attitude of the owner, zero cleanliness

If you compare prices, one the best hotel in town with, the best part is clean and neat with fresh air, specious rooms, and good staff behaviour. What else will you get in budget hotels tariff is 600 inr only.

The rooms are cheap but disgustingly unhygienic. As we had no other option, we had to stay here for a night. The place is not clean at all. We had lived here previously but the hygiene has just degraded. The jet spray in the loo wasn't operational. The air conditioning was not powerful enough to cool down a room. There are literally no charging points and whatever is there, has been damaged. They do not provide soap or shampoos and the drinking water provided is a bit salty.
